highlights: Lead front-end development, maintaining and enhancing features of domainagents.com and openingsoon.com
Collaborate with the team to ensure a seamless user experience.
Optimize web performance and responsiveness across devices.

Led the complete migration and modernization of several apps to Flutter, including Al Jadeed, Lebanon 24, Aliman TV, and Ekher el Akhbar, integrating advanced features such as news updates, live streaming, episodes video playback, Google Cast & Apple AirPlay support, Picture-in-Picture, Banner/IMA Ads, Push Notifications, QR Code login, Caching, Quick Actions, and performance optimizations.
Developed Al Jadeed for tvOS using React Native and contributed to its implementation on the Tizen platform with web technologies.
Developed Ian Assist for Mideast Assistance, featuring support tickets, live chat, claim submissions, and document uploads.
Rebuilt the Ticketing Box Office app with event browsing, direct booking, ticket scanning, and integrated charts.
Created the Fujairah TV app from scratch, featuring a weather section, episode reminders, and video player capabilities.
Engineered Urban Beirut, a user-centric e-commerce app for purchasing customizable furniture.
Engineered Beirutic , an e-commerce app for tech products, focusing on user-friendly design and seamless shopping experiences.
Participated in developing a new internal web platform for employee management using ReactJS and NodeJS.
Developed a cinema booking app suite for Iraqi Cinema, including desktop POS, mobile user apps, and kiosk self-checkout, all built with Flutter.
Created Artist and More, a ticket scanner app for event admissions, using Flutter.
Developed USA Cab Ads, an app for monitoring and analyzing NYC cab advertisements, with GPS tracking and advanced analytics.
Designed and launched Target Food, a comprehensive e-commerce grocery app, using Flutter for a seamless, cross-platform shopping experience.
Contributed to a delivery based app with Google Maps tracking.
